summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent in the New York VCAC/Human Trafficking unit, dated April 26, 2019, notifying recipients that Jeffrey Epstein possesses three U.S. passports and that a travel alert has been established for him.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The email states that Epstein has three U.S. passports and that a travel hit (alert) has been put in place for him.

events.title: Travel Alert Established for Epstein
events.description: An FBI Special Agent sends an email notifying that a travel hit (alert) has been put in place for Jeffrey Epstein and that he possesses three U.S. passports.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was confirmed to possess three separate U.S. passports as of April 2019.
A travel alert or 'hit' was actively placed on Epstein by law enforcement, likely to monitor or restrict his movements.
The communication originated from the FBI's New York VCAC (Violent Crimes Against Children)/Human Trafficking unit, indicating the nature of the investigation.
